description: Main entry point and root widget for the Flutter app 'Menu Image Generator'. It sets up environment variables, theme, and initial routing to screens such as CaptureScreen and ProcessingScreen.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that defines the app's theme and routing. Uses a dark theme with custom color scheme and buttons.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a customized dark ThemeData with specific color scheme, button styles, and app bar styling.
